[console_scripts]
sgfdata = libsgfdata.cmd:main

[libsgfdata.dumpers]
sgf = libsgfdata.dumper:dump

[libsgfdata.parsers]
sgf = libsgfdata.parser:parse

[libsgfdata.transforms]
depth = libsgfdata.cmd_depth:cmd_depth
depth_to_material = libsgfdata.cmd_depth_to_material:depth_to_material
normalize = libsgfdata.cmd_normalize:cmd_normalize
sample_dtm = libsgfdata.cmd_dtm:sample_dtm
